sentence.Network_en: All indications are that it is everywhere basaltic and relatively constant in composition.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有的迹象只表明海洋地壳处都是玄武岩质的,组成也比较稳定.

sentence.Network_en: Basaltic lava first erupted from the center and built up the volcano.
sentence.Network_cn: 首先是玄武岩浆从中间喷发,构成火山.

sentence.Network_en: In the Liaodong and Shandong Peninsulas, there are basaltic plateaus.
sentence.Network_cn: 辽东半岛和山东半岛上, 则出现玄武岩高原.

list.abs: 霞石细晶岩 nepheline aplite霞石玄武岩 nepheline basalt-
magma association 岩浆共生组合magma basalt 玻璃玄武岩magma consolidation 岩浆固结
裂缝喷发(Fissure eruption)∶岩浆沿地表裂缝处溢流,最常发生于玄武岩岩浆(因其黏滞性低)。广大的裂缝喷发会形成大片熔岩高原,称之为高原玄武岩(Plateau basalt) 或.
玄武岩纤维(basalt fiber)是一种新的混凝土增强材料，由纯天然的火山岩(含玄武岩)矿石经高温熔融、拉丝而成，是典型的硅酸盐纤维…

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or containing basalt;
